Articles.Content:
In a world where space travel is possible, someone will eventually fulfill that goal. Many have failed, and many have succeeded.

The crew of this Soyuz TMA spacecraft wish to know what it is like to be in space, and this movie tells their story.

This is my second cinematic movie of Kerbal Space Program, and I think it was a clear improvement over my last video, Why.

You can find my other videos under the YouTube name "Naten Johnson." Or, you can find my videos here: http://youtube.com/natenjohnson

I hope you enjoy the video. Thanks for reading, and I appreciate every view I get on my videos. Thanks.

-Naten

[The video may still be processing by the time you see this. Sorry, I just made this thread while I was uploading. It shouldn't be long, but still, my apologies. ]
